SA14n1178:15: dharmakāyaścetyaṣṭau padārthā abhisamayālaṅkāre dvābhyāṃ kārikābhyāṃ pradarśitāḥ | yathā -
SA14n1178:22: ekasminneva kṣaṇe yāvatpadārthākārāṇāṃ yathāvat sākṣātkāri paryantajñānaṃ sarvākārajñatāyā lakṣaṇam |
SA14n1178:25: yā prajñā aśeṣākārān jānāti sā yāvajjñānam,
SA14n1178:26: yā ca yathā padārthānāṃ svarūpaṃ tathā jānātīti yathāvajjñānam |
SA14n1178:27: athavā - cittotpādādihetūnāṃ anāsravaphalānāṃ ca aśeṣākārasākṣātkāri sarvākārajñānamityeko bhedaḥ |
SA14n1178:28: buddhabhūmau jāyamānāni dvāviṃśatiḥ anāsravajñānānīti dvitīyo bhedaḥ |
SA14n1178:33: mārgatrayaniḥsvabhāvatvasākṣātkāriṇyā prajñayopāttatve sati āryamāhāyānikābhisamayatvaṃ mārgajñatāyā lakṣaṇam |
SA14n1178:41: mahāyānadarśanamārgamārabhya buddhabhūmiṃ yāvat mārgajñatāyāḥ sīmā bhavati |
SA14n1178:44: samastadharmagatapudgalanairātmyasākṣātkāriṇyā prajñayopāttatvena hainayānikajātīyābhisamayasvarūpaṃ āryasantatisthaṃ jñānaṃ mārgajñatāyā lakṣaṇam |
SA14n1178:48: phalabhūtāyā jinajananyā dūratvam avidūratvaṃ ceti sarvajñatāyā dvau bhedau |
SA14n1178:53: trisarvajñatākārāṇāṃ bhāvanāmayyā prajñayopāttaḥ sattvayogaḥ sarvākārābhisambodha iti lakṣaṇam |
SA14n1178:56: ākāreṇa trisarvajñatāsambaddhānāṃ trisaptatyuttaraśatasaṃkhyākānāmākārāṇāmabhinirhārakāḥ sattvayogāḥ trisaptatyuttaraśatamasya sarvākārābhisambodhasya bhedā bhavanti |
SA14n1178:66: śūnyatālambanayā bhāvanāmayyā prajñayopāttānāṃ taddṛṣṭyā vyavasthāpitānāṃ ca trisarvajñatākārāṇāṃ bhāvanāyāṃ prakarṣaparyantaḥ sattvayogaḥ mūrdhaprayogaḥ iti mūrdhābhisamayasya lakṣaṇam |
SA14n1178:67: bodhisattvasya śrutamayyā prajñayopāttānāṃ prayogāṇāmapyatraiva saṃgṛhītatvāllakṣaṇe taddṛṣṭyā vyavasthāpiteti viśeṣaṇam |
SA14n1178:74: darśanabhāvanāmārgayo ānantaryamūrdhaprayogāstraya iti sapta mūrdhaprayogā bhavantīti |
SA14n1178:75: vistareṇa tu trisaptatyuttaraśataṃ mūrdhaprayogā iti jñeyam |
SA14n1178:80: trisarvajñatākārāṇāṃ sthirīkaraṇāya vibhāvanāvyavasthāpitaḥ sattvayoga ānupūrvikaprayoga iti lakṣaṇam |
SA14n1178:87: trisarvajñatākārāṇāṃ svabhyastīkaraṇāya anupūrvabhāvanayotpannaḥ pāryantikaḥ sattvayogaḥ ekakṣaṇābhisambodha iti lakṣaṇam |
SA14n1178:94: trisarvajñatākārāṇāṃ bhāvanāprakarṣabalenotpannaṃ phalaṃ paryantānāsravaguṇā vā dharmakāya iti lakṣaṇam |
SA14n1178:105: dharmakāyopalakṣakāścatvāra iti saptatiḥ padārthāstriṣu vibhajya pṛthak nirūpyante |
SA14n1178:120: 10. niryāṇapratipattiriti daśa dharmāḥ sarvākārajñatāmupalakṣayantīti abhisamayālaṅkāre dvābhyāṃ kārikābhyāṃ pradarśitāḥ | yathā -
SA14n1178:129: abhisamayālaṅkāre tisṛbhiḥ kārikābhiḥ sarva pratipāditam | tathāhi -
SA14n1178:131: samāsavyāsataḥ sā ca yathāsūtraṃ ca cocyate ||
SA14n1178:137: parārthāya svahetukena chandena samudānītaṃ bodhikāmatāsamprayuktaṃ māhāyānika viśiṣṭaṃ manovijñāna cittotpāda iti lakṣaṇam |
SA14n1178:139: svārthāṃ bodhiṃ parārthaṃ ca parasantatistha nirvāṇamālambya cittotpādaḥ pravartate |
SA14n1178:141: bodhipraṇidhisvabhāvaḥ bodhiprasthānasvabhāvaśceti svarūpataścittotpādasya dvau bhedau bhavataḥ |
SA14n1178:177: śravaṇaniyamaśceti sarvo viṣayaḥ abhisamayālaṅkāre dvābhyāṃ kārikābhyāṃ pratipāditaḥ | tathāhi-
SA14n1178:183: mokṣamārgasya abhrāntopadeśaḥ avavāda iti lakṣaṇaṃ bhavati |
SA14n1178:187: tataḥ paścādaprāptaguṇaprāptimupādāya anuśāsanāvavāda iti dvau bhedau |
SA14n1178:189: tathāhi- pratiapattyākāramadhikṛtya satyadvayasvarūpamanatikramya śikṣaṇaṃ pratipattyavavādaḥ prathamaḥ |
SA14n1178:196: yo'parapratyayagāmitvahetuḥ pañca cakṣūṃṣi tadviṣayakaḥ pañcacakṣuravavādaḥ saptamaḥ |
SA14n1178:197: yaḥ sava kārajñatāparipūrihetuḥ ṣaḍabhijñāḥ tadviṣayako'bhijñāvavādaḥ aṣṭamaḥ |
SA14n1178:198: parikalpitasvabhāvānāṃ darśanaprahātavyānāṃ kleśānāṃ sabījānāṃ sarvathā samudghātako yo darśanamārgastadviṣayako darśanamārgāvavādo navamaḥ |
SA14n1178:199: bhāvanāprahātavyānāṃ sahajāvaraṇānāṃ sabījānāṃ sarvathā samudghātako yo bhāvanāmārgastadviṣayako bhāvanāmārgāvavādo daśamaḥ |
SA14n1178:203: mārge'praviṣṭo'pi śuddhādhyāśayikaḥ śuddhakarmikaḥ pudgalo māhāyānīyāvavādaṃ śrotuṃ bhavyo bhavati |
SA14n1178:204: yaśca mārgapraviṣṭo bodhisattvaḥ sa kalpānāmanekāni buddhebhyo bodhisattvebhyaḥ kalyāṇamitrebhyaḥ avavādaṃ śṛṇoti |
SA14n1178:206: caturvidhanirvedhabhāgīyānāmūṣmādīnāṃ lakṣaṇa-bheda-avadhyālambanākārādayaḥ abhisamayālaṅkāre dvābhyāṃ kāribhyāṃ pratipāditāḥ | tathādi -
SA14n1178:218: prayogamārgeṣu triṣu pratisvaṃ ūṣma-mūrva-kṣāntyagradharmākhyāścatvāro bhedā bhavanti |
SA14n1178:227: eteṣu nirvedhabhāgīyeṣu pratyekaṃ mṛdu-madhyādhimātrabhedena tridhā bhavati |
SA14n1178:231: kimapyekaṃ nairātmyamālambya pravartamānāyā vidarśanāyāḥ prāptimārabhya bhūmiprāptiparyantaṃ prayogamārgasya vyāptirbhavati |
SA14n1178:240: idaṃ ca vaiśiṣṭyam abhisamayālaṅkāre “ālambanamanityādi“ - ityataḥ prāramya “sarvathā samparigrahaḥ“ - ityantaṃ navabhiḥ kārikābhiḥ suviśadaṃ vyākhyātam |
SA14n1178:243: tasya lakṣaṇādikam abhisamayālaṅkāre dvābhyāṃ kārikābhyāṃ varṇitam | tathā hi -
SA14n1178:249: sāmānyato yo dharmadhātuḥ pariśodhitaḥ san bodhau pariṇamate,
SA14n1178:251: viśeṣato yo dharmadhātuḥ pariśodhitaḥ san anuttarāyāṃ samyak sambodhau pariṇamate,
SA14n1178:255: abhidhānadṛṣṭyā prakṛtigotraṃ paripuṣṭagotraṃ ceti dvau bhedau |
SA14n1178:256: mahāyānapratipatterāśrayabhūtaṃ prakṛtisthaṃ gotram āśritadharmadṛṣṭyā trayodaśavidha bhavati |
SA14n1178:270: viśeṣataśca upariṣṭāt sākṣānnirdiṣṭaprayogamārgīyoṣmāvasthātaḥ prārabhya antimakṣaṇasthabodhisattvāvasthāparyantamasya vyāptirbhavatīti jñeyam |
SA14n1178:272: pratipatterālambanānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ bhedaḥ avadhiśceti trīṇyatra pratipādyante |
SA14n1178:273: abhisamayālaṅkāre dvābhyāṃ kārikābhyāṃ ālambanasvarūpaṃ pradarśitam | tathā hi-
SA14n1178:292: adhigamānukrameṇa sarvadharmā yathāvadālambyanta iti nāstyālambanānāṃ bhūmyavadhiriti jñeyam |
SA14n1178:294: asya lakṣaṇaṃ bhedaḥ avadhiriti trīṇi parijñātavyāni,
SA14n1178:295: tāni abhisamayālaṅkāre kārikayaikayā'nayā nirdiṣṭāni | tathā hi -
SA14n1178:299: pratipattau pratiṣṭhitasya bodhisattvasya svalakṣyameva pratipattisamuddeśa iti lakṣaṇam |
SA14n1178:307: asyā lakṣaṇādikam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayetthamupavarṇitam | yathā
SA14n1178:308: dānādau ṣaḍvidhe teṣāṃ pratyekaṃ saṃgraheṇa yā |
SA14n1178:311: mahāyānacittotpādamāśritya anuttarasamyaksaṃmbodhiniṣpattaye yā trisarvajñatāviṣaye sāmānyena śukladharmādhiṣṭhānā,
SA14n1178:312: sarvākārābhisambodhādau caturvidhe'bhisamaye pratyabhisamayaṃ ṣaṭpāramitādhiṣṭhānā ca kriyā,
SA14n1178:321: ṣaṭpāramitāsu pratipāramitāṃ ṣaṭpāramitāsaṃgrāhikayā prajñayopāttaḥ sattvayogaḥ sannāhapratipatterlakṣaṇam |
SA14n1178:324: dānapāramitāsannāhapratipattimārabhya prajñāpāramitāsannāhapratipattiṃ yāvat ṣaḍ bhedā bhavanti |
SA14n1178:326: evaṃ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu ṣaṭ ṣaṭkānīti kṛtvā vistareṇa ṣaṭtriṃśad bhedā bhavanti |
SA14n1178:330: asyāḥ svarūpam abhisamayālaṅkāre dvābhyāṃ kārikābhyāmupavarṇitam | tathā hi
SA14n1178:336: bhāvanāpradhānayā pratipattyā mahāyāne hetvātmake phalātmake vā dharme prasthitikriyā prasthānapratipatterlakṣaṇam |
SA14n1178:351: asthāḥ pratipatterlakṣaṇādikaṃ sarvam abhisamayālaṅkāre dvābhyāṃ kārikābhyāṃ samyak pratipāditam | tathā hi -
SA14n1178:353: yuganaddhaśca yo mārgaṃ upāye yacca kauśalam ||
SA14n1178:354: jñānaṃ puṇyaṃ ca mārgaśca dhāraṇī bhūmayo daśa |
SA14n1178:357: ātmanaḥ phalabhūtāṃ mahābodhiṃ yā sākṣāt pradadāti tādṛśī kriyā sambhārapratipattiriti lakṣaṇam |
SA14n1178:379: kintu ye mahābodhiprāpaktvena sākṣānnirdiṣṭāste sambhārāḥ prayogamārgīyāgradharmāvasthāta ārabhya antimakṣaṇasthabodhisattvāvasthāparyantaṃ bhavanti |
SA14n1178:381: ṣoḍaśo bhūmisambhāraḥ saptadaśaśca pratipakṣasambhāro daśasu bhūmiṣu bhavataḥ |
SA14n1178:383: asyāḥ svarūpam abhisamayālaṅkāre dvābhyāṃ kārikābhyāṃ samyak pradarśitam | tathā hi-
SA14n1178:389: ekāntena sarvajñatāyāṃ niryāṇakaraḥ śauddhabhūmikaḥ sattvayogaḥ niryāṇapratipattiriti lakṣaṇam |
SA14n1178:414: 11. atyantaviśuddhiśceti ekādaśa dharmā mārgajñatāmupalakṣayantīti abhisamayālaṅkāre tisṛbhiḥ kārikābhirupadarśitāḥ | tathā hi -
SA14n1178:422: dhyāmīkaraṇatādīnāṃ mārgajñatāṅgānāṃ lakṣaṇādikaṃ sarvam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayopavarṇitam | tathā hi -
SA14n1178:424: viṣayo niyato vyāptiḥ svabhāvastasya karma ca ||
SA14n1178:426: mārgajñatāparipūrakā avayavībhūtā guṇā eva mārgajñatāṅgānīti lakṣaṇam |
SA14n1178:427: athavā - mārgajñatāparipūrakāḥ asyāmavasthāyāṃ sākṣānnirdiṣṭāḥ sattvasantatisthaguṇā mārgajñatāṅgānīti lakṣaṇam |
SA14n1178:437: sākṣānnirdiṣṭāṅgānāṃ dṛṣṭyā sambhāramārgamārabhya antimakṣaṇasthabodhisattvāvasthāparyantaṃ sīmā bhavati |
SA14n1178:439: śrāvakamārgādhigamasya lakṣaṇādikam abhisamayālaṅkāre agholikhitayaikayā kārikayā samyagupadarśitam | tathā hi -
SA14n1178:443: śrāvakajātīyavineyajanānugrahārthaṃ duḥkhādicaturāryasatyeṣu kimapyekamālambya anityādiṣoḍaśākāreṣvanyatamasya sākṣātkāradṛṣṭyā vyavasthāpitaḥ śrāvakādhigamajātīyo māhāyānikāryābhisamayaḥ śrāvakamārgajña mārgajñānamiti |
SA14n1178:451: pratyekabuddhādhigamasya lakṣaṇādikaṃ sarvamabhisamayālaṅkāre tisṛbhiḥ kārikābhiḥ pratipāditam | tathā hi -
SA14n1178:454: suśrūṣā yasya yasyārthe yatra yatra yathā yathā |
SA14n1178:455: sa so'rthaḥ khyātyaśabdo'pi tatra tatra tathā tathā ||
SA14n1178:459: pratyekabuddhagotrīyavineyajanānugrahārthaṃ dvādaśāyatanānyālambya bāhyagrāhyārthaśūnyatāsākṣātkārijñānadṛṣṭyā vyavasthāpitaḥ pratyekabuddhādhigamajātīyo māhāyānikāryābhisamayaḥ pratyekabuddhamārgamārgajñaṃ mārgajñānamiti |
SA14n1178:474: samāhitajñānaṃ pṛṣṭhalabdhajñānaṃ ceti dvau darśanamārgasya bhedau |
SA14n1178:478: tṛtīyaṃ yanmahāyānamārgaṃ jānātīti trayo bhedā bhavanti |
SA14n1178:480: aṣṭau ca jñānānīti ṣoḍaśa bhedā avasātavyāḥ |
SA14n1178:484: bhāvanāmārgakāritrāṇāṃ lakṣaṇādikam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā spaṣṭamupadarśitam | tathā hi -
SA14n1178:498: prathamāṃ bhūmimārabhya daśamīṃ bhūmiṃ yāvadasya sīmā bhavati |
SA14n1178:508: tatra sāsravaḥ savikalpabhāvanāmārgaḥ anāsravaśca nirvikalpa iti |
SA14n1178:512: adhimuktibhāvanāmārgasya lakṣaṇādikaṃ sarvam abhisamayālaṅkāre dvābhyāṃ kārikābhyāṃ spaṣṭamādarśitam |tathā hi-
SA14n1178:518: svārtha-svaparārtha-parārthākarabhūtāyāṃ jinajananyām abhisampratyayavaśena vyavasthāpito māhāyāniko'nvabhisamayo'dhimuktyākhyabhāvanāmārgaḥ savikalpa iti lakṣaṇam |
SA14n1178:520: adhimuktiḥ svārthā svaparārthā parārthā ceti mūlabhedena trividhā |
SA14n1178:521: trividhā'pi satī mṛdumadhyādhimātrabhedena pratyekaṃ medāt trikatribhirnavadhā bhavati |
SA14n1178:524: evameṣā'pi navaprakārā'dhimuktiḥ mṛdumṛdvādiprakārabhedena pratyekaṃ vibhidyamānā navabhistribhiḥ saptaviṃśatiprakārā bhavati |
SA14n1178:536: prathamāṃ bhūmimārabhya daśamīṃ bhūmiṃ yāvad asyāḥ sīmā bhavati |
SA14n1178:539: bhāvanāmārgādhimuktasya bodhisattvasya stutyādīnāṃ lakṣaṇādikam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayopavarṇitam | tathā hi -
SA14n1178:540: stutiḥ stobhaḥ praśaṃsā ca prajñāpāramitāṃ prati |
SA14n1178:543: purvoktatrividhādhimuktiprajñāpāramitāṃ prati pravṛttasya tadbhāvakabodhisattvasyotsāhavardhanārthaṃ tadadhimokṣasya kriyamāṇāḥ stutyādayo yathābhūtārthādhigamalakṣaṇā nārthavādarūpā iti lakṣaṇam |
SA14n1178:549: asyāḥ pariṇāmanāyāḥ lakṣaṇabhedādisarvaṃ svarūpam abhisamayālaṅkāre tisṛbhiḥ kārikābhiḥ spaṣṭamupadarśitam | tathā hi-
SA14n1178:557: yo māhāyānikaḥ savikalpo'nvabhisamayaḥ svaparakuśalapuṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau pariṇāmayati,
SA14n1178:575: prathamāṃ pramuditā bhūmimārabhya yāvad daśamīṃ bhūmimasya pariṇāmanāmanaskārasya sīmā bhavati |
SA14n1178:577: anumodanāmanaskārasya lakṣaṇabhedādayo'bhisamayālaṅkāre ekayaiva kārikayetthamupavarṇitam | tathā hi -
SA14n1178:591: anāsravasya abhinirhārabhāvanāmārgasya lakṣaṇādikam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā pratipāditam | tathā hi -
SA14n1178:606: prathamāṃ bhūmimārabhya daśamīṃ bhūmiṃ yāvadasyābhinirhārasya sīmā bhavati |
SA14n1178:608: atyantaviśuddhyākhyasya anāsravabhāvanāmārgasya lakṣaṇādikaṃ sarvam abhisamayālaṅkāre tisṛbhiḥ kārikābhiḥ suspaṣṭaṃ pratipāditam | tathā hi-
SA14n1178:620: bhāvanāmārgaprahātavyānāṃ navānāṃ vipakṣāṇāṃ pratipakṣabhūtā mṛdumṛdvādayo nava bhāvanāmārgā evāsya atyantaviśuddhibhāvanāmārgasya bhedā bhavanti |
SA14n1178:622: prathamāṃ bhūmimārabhya daśamabhūmiparyantamasya bhāvanāmārgasya sīmā bhavatīti |
SA14n1178:633: 9. darśanamārgaśceti nava dharmāḥ sarvajñatopalakṣakā iti abhisamayālaṅkāre dvābhyāṃ kārikābhyāṃ samyaguktāḥ | tathā hi -
SA14n1178:634: prajñayā na bhave sthānaṃ kṛpayā na śame sthitiḥ |
SA14n1178:640: ubhayorlakṣaṇādikam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā pratipāditam | tathā hi-
SA14n1178:641: nāpare na pare tīre nāntarāle tayoḥ sthitā |
SA14n1178:646: anityādiṣoḍaśākārāṇāṃ sākṣātkāriṇī hīnayānajātīyā mahākaruṇāgarbhā māhāyānikaryasantatisthā prajñā asyāḥ sarvajñatāyā lakṣaṇam |
SA14n1178:647: iyaṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitā prajñayā saṃsārādīnavadarśanāt na saṃsāre bhavānte sthitā |
SA14n1178:649: darśanamārgaḥ bhāvanāmārgaḥ aśaikṣamārgaśceti trayo bhedā bhavanti |
SA14n1178:650: duḥkhādicaturāryasatyasambaddhānityādiṣoḍaśākārāṇāṃ sākṣātkārī mahāyānabhāvanāmārgo'syāḥ sarvajñatāyāḥ prajñatā na bhave sthānamitilakṣaṇātmikāyā upalakṣakaḥ |
SA14n1178:654: iyaṃ ca prajñāpāramitā kṛpayā sattvārthakaraṇāt na nirvāṇe śamānte sthitā |
SA14n1178:655: māhāyānikabhāvanāmārgīyāryapudgalasantatisthā mahākaruṇā asyāḥ kṛpayā na śame sthitiritimārgajñatāyā upalakṣikā |
SA14n1178:657: māhāyānikasyāryasya sattvālambanā dharmālambanā nirālambanā ceti tisro mahākaruṇāḥ,
SA14n1178:659: traiyadhvikadharmāṇāmanutpādākāreṇa tulyatāvabodhāt yā śrāvakādyagocaratvena viprakṛṣṭā bodhisattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitā,
SA14n1178:667: asya lakṣaṇādikaṃ sarvam abhisamayālaṅkāre kārikārdhena spaṣṭamullikhitam tathā hi -
SA14n1178:670: śrāvakādīnām adhvasamatājñānābhāvāt anityādyākārāṇāṃ sākṣātkāri jñānaṃ sanimittopalambhayogena kṛpāprajñāvaikalyāt dūrībhūtaṃ jinajananyā iti lakṣaṇam |
SA14n1178:676: asya lakṣaṇādīnāṃ pratipādanam abhisamayālaṅkāre kārikārdhena samyak kṛtam | tathā hi -
SA14n1178:679: mahākaruṇayā śūnyatāsākṣātkāriṇyā prajñayā copāttaṃ māhāyānikaryāṇāṃ hīnayānajātīyam anityādyākārajñānam asya lakṣaṇam |
SA14n1178:680: “bodhisattvādīnāṃ tu utsāritabhāvābhiniveśabhrāntinimittānāṃ rūpādisarvadharmaparijñānameva tatsamatāparijñānamityataḥ samyagāsannībhāvo māturiti jñeyam |“
SA14n1178:688: asya lakṣaṇādikam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayāṃ kārikayā suspaṣṭaṃ pratipāditam | tathā hi-
SA14n1178:692: mahākaruṇā śūnyatāprajñābhyāṃ viyuktā bhāvolambhasvabhāvā hainayānikī vastujñateti lakṣaṇam |
SA14n1178:693: “sarveṣāṃ rūpādīnāṃ traiyadhvikānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ sāsravānāsravobhayasthānīyānāmanupalambhasvarūpāṇāṃ sarvatra bhāvopalambhatayā te paraparikalpitātmādiśūnyatvena dṛṣṭāḥ |
SA14n1178:694: anuṣṭhānasaṃjñā tu eteṣāṃ pratipakṣabhūtāpi viparyāsapravṛttatvena heyatvāt vipakṣo bhavati |“
SA14n1178:696: asya bhedo'vadhiścetyubhau 'anupāyena dūratvam' ityasmin prakareṇa yathā pradarśitau,
SA14n1178:699: asya lakṣaṇabhedādikaṃ sarvam abhisamayālaṅkāre tisṛbhiḥ kārikābhiḥ savistaramupadarśitam | tathā hi-
SA14n1178:707: mahākaruṇopāyena śūnyatāsākṣātkāriṇyā prajñayā copāttā māhāyānikāryasantatisthā vastujñatā pratipakṣalakṣaṇātmikā |
SA14n1178:709: ubhāvapi pūrva 'upāyena avidūratā' ityasmin prasaṅge yathāvarṇitau tathā jñātavyau |
SA14n1178:724: evaṃ kṛtvā yathoktau vai jñeyaḥ sarvajñatānaye |
SA14n1178:727: “śrāvakādīnāmevaṃ māturdūrībhāvenānuṣṭhānaṃ pratipakṣo'pi san vastūpalambhaviparyāsapravṛttatvena bodhisattvānāṃ tyājyatvād vipakṣa iti“ |
SA14n1178:729: asya lakṣaṇabhedādikaṃ sarvam abhisamayālaṅkāre sārdhadvayena kārikāgranthena savistaraṃ pratipāditam | tathā hi-
SA14n1178:732: avikāro na kartā ca prayogo duṣkarastridhā |
SA14n1178:736: sāṃvṛtike vastusvarūpe tadviśeṣe ca viparyāsapravṛttasya upalambhābhiniveśasya pratipakṣabhūto hīnayānajātīyaḥ sattvayogaḥ prayoga iti lakṣaṇam |
SA14n1178:752: asyāḥ svarūpam abhisamayālaṅkāre kārikārdhena samādarśitam | tathā hi -
SA14n1178:757: pūrvokteṣu daśavidhaprayogeṣu pratisvaṃ catasraḥ amananā bhavantīti catvāriṃśadasyāḥ samatāyāḥ prabhedā bhavanti |
SA14n1178:759: “tadevaṃ rūpādipadārthamananā-nīlādinimittamananā - ' rūpaṃ dvidhā viṃśatidhe' - tyādiprapañcamananā- nirvedhabhāgīyādyadhigamamananānāṃ pratiṣedhena jñātṛjñeyadharmānupalabdhiścaturvidhoktā vijñeyā |“
SA14n1178:763: asya lakṣaṇādikaṃ sarvam abhisamayālaṅkāre pañcabhiḥ kārikābhiḥ pratipāditam |
SA14n1178:767: trayāṇāṃ yānānāṃ trayāṇāṃ darśamārgāṇāṃ vyāvṛttibhedena ṣoḍaśa kṣaṇā evāsya ṣoḍaśa bhedā bhavantīti |
SA14n1178:784: 11. upāyakauśalamityekādaśa dharmāḥ sarvākārābhisambodhamupalakṣayantīti abhisamayālaṅkāre dvābhyāṃ kārikābhyāmupadarśitam | tathā hi-
SA14n1178:790: trisarvajñatāsambaddhānāṃ trisaptatyuttaraikaśatākārāṇāṃ bhāvanāmayyā prajñayopāttatvena vyavasthāpitaḥ satvayogaḥ sarvākārābhisambodha iti lakṣaṇam |
SA14n1178:804: ākārāṇāṃ lakṣaṇādikaṃ sarvam abhisamayālaṅkāre pañcabhiḥ kārikābhiḥ savistaraṃ samyagupavarṇitam |
SA14n1178:806: sarvākāramārgavastujñānasaṃgraheṇa trisarvajñatākārāṇāṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ prayogavaiśiṣṭyam ākārāṇāṃ lakṣaṇamiti |
SA14n1178:812: caturāryasatyeṣu prathamataḥ trayāṇāṃ satyānāṃ pratyekaṃ catvāra iti dvādaśa,
SA14n1178:817: catvāraḥ pratisatyaṃ te mārge pañcadaśa smṛtāḥ ||
SA14n1178:821: nirodhasatyasya ṣoḍaśa ceti mārgajñatāyāḥ ṣaṭtriṃśad ākārā bhavanti |
SA14n1178:823: hetau mārge ca duḥkhe ca nirodhe ca yathākramam |
SA14n1178:824: aṣṭau te sapta pañceti ṣoḍaśeti ca kīrtitāḥ ||
SA14n1178:827: buddhānāṃ sarvākārajñatāyā asādhāraṇā ekonacatvāriṃśacceti sarvākārajñatāyā daśottaraśatam ākārā bhavanti |
SA14n1178:833: jñānākārebhyaḥ pūrvam arthākārāḥ parijñātavyā iti prathamataḥ trisaptatyuttaraśatam arthākārā upadarśitāḥ |
SA14n1178:835: prayogāṇāṃ lakṣaṇādikam abhisamayālaṅkāre catasṛbhiḥ kārikābhiḥ savistaraṃ suspaṣṭamupavarṇitam |
SA14n1178:837: jñātṛjñeyayoḥ vastumārgākārāṇāṃ ca śamathavipaśyanāyuganaddhabhāvanāsvarūpaṃ niḥsvabhāvatāniṣprapañcātmakaṃ jñānamevātra sākṣānnirdiṣṭasya prayogasya lakṣaṇamiti |
SA14n1178:838: athavā-trisarvajñatānāṃ yāvadākārāṇāṃ śamathavipaśyanāyuganaddhabhāvanāmayyā prajñayopāttaḥ sattvayoga evātra nirdiṣṭaprayogasya lakṣaṇam |
SA14n1178:839: yato hi 'kṛcchrāccireṇa prativodhataḥ' ityanena nirdiṣṭaḥ sambhāramārgīyaḥ prayogo'tra saṃgṛhīto bhavati |
SA14n1178:851: na ca svapne'pi ṣaṭpāramitācaryāsu dūrībhāva iti vyākaraṇalābhaprayogaḥ,
SA14n1178:854: agradharmābhisamayamārabhya stambādyanupalambhāt mahāsamudrasyābhyāsannatvamiva satatabhāvanādipratipattyā nirantaraprayogabalena dharmaṃdhātoḥ sākṣāddarśanasyābhyāsannatvaniścaya iti nirantaraprayogaḥ,
SA14n1178:859: tadyathā paramārthato guṇadoṣāṇāṃ vṛddhiparihāṇyadarśanena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṇānujñānāt avṛddhyaparihāṇiprayogaḥ,
SA14n1178:868: tasmāt paramaratnasvabhāvāyā mātuḥ saṃvatsareṇa bahvantarāyatve'pi likhanaṃ śīghrameveti avadhiprayogaḥ |
SA14n1178:870: guṇānāṃ lakṣaṇādikaṃ sarvam abhisamayālaṅkāre kārikārdhenopadarśitam | tathā hi-
SA14n1178:876: tathā hi- pāramitāyāṃ udgṛhyamāṇāyāṃ mārakṛtavighnāḥ tathāgatānubhāvena vyāhanyanta iti māraśaktivyāghātaguṇaḥ,
SA14n1178:891: prayogāṇāṃ doṣā abhisamayālaṅkāre kārikārdhena upadarśitāḥ | tathā hi-
SA14n1178:919: amī viśatiḥ doṣāḥ pāramitāyāṃ pravṛttasya yogino'ntarāyakarāḥ pratipāditāḥ |
SA14n1178:952: saṃkṣepeṇa lakṣaṇasya pratipādanam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā kṛtam | tathā hi -
SA14n1178:953: lakṣyate yena tajjñeyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ trividhaṃ ca tat |
SA14n1178:954: jñānaṃ viśeṣaḥ kāritraṃ svabhāvo yaśca lakṣyate ||
SA14n1178:955: vistareṇa tu lakṣaṇānāṃ pratipādanam abhisamayālaṅkāre aṣṭādaśabhiḥ kārikabhiḥ samyag vihitam |
SA14n1178:963: kāritralakṣaṇāni ekādaśa svabhāvalakṣaṇāni ṣoḍaśa ceti lakṣaṇānāṃ bhedā vistareṇa ekanavatiḥ bhavanti |
SA14n1178:965: jñanalakṣaṇānāṃ sarveṣāṃ vistareṇa pratipādanam abhisamayālaṅkāre navabhiḥ kārikābhiḥ suspaṣṭaṃ vihitam |
SA14n1178:968: kleśaliṅgādayo vakṣyamāṇāḥ svabhāvā eva eteṣāṃ upalakṣakāḥ |
SA14n1178:973: sarvākārajñatāsaṃgṛhītāni jñānalakṣaṇāni ṣoḍaśa ceti tridhā bhedaḥ |
SA14n1178:1045: viśeṣalakṣaṇānāṃ ṣoḍaśānāṃ lakṣaṇādikaṃ sarvam abhisamayālaṅkāre samyagupadarśitam | tathā hi-
SA14n1178:1053: māhāyānīyadarśanamārgīyakṣāntijñānakṣaṇāni ṣoḍhaśa śrāvakapratyekabuddhadarśanamārgasambaddhakṣāntijñānakṣaṇebhyo viśiṣṭatarāṇīti ṣoḍaśa bhedā bhavanti | tathā hi-
SA14n1178:1054: duḥkhasatyālambanāni catuḥkṣaṇasaṃgṛhītāni kṣāntijñānāni kramaśaḥ acintyaviśeṣaḥ atulyaviśeṣaḥ,
SA14n1178:1069: yena śrāvakādimārgebhyo bodhisattvādīnāṃ mārgajñatādidvaye viśeṣamārgo viśiṣyate |
SA14n1178:1078: kāritrāṇāṃ lakṣaṇādikaṃ abhisamayālaṅkāre dvābhyāṃ kārikābhyāṃ samyagāveditam | tathā hi-
SA14n1178:1079: hitaṃ sukhaṃ ca trāṇaṃ ca śaraṇaṃ layanaṃ nṛṇām |
SA14n1178:1084: hitasukhatrāṇādiprativiśiṣṭajñānaiḥ sattvaprayogāḥ parārthasampādanasādhanaiḥ yojyanta iti tāni kāritralakṣaṇānyucyante |
SA14n1178:1105: kāritrākārairevaṃ yathāvat sarvajñatātrayasya prayogā lakṣyanta iti kāritralakṣaṇam |
SA14n1178:1107: eteṣāṃ svabhāvalakṣaṇānāṃ svarūpapratipādanam abhisamayālaṅkāre tisṛbhiḥ kārikābhiḥ samyag vihitam |
SA14n1178:1134: ityevaṃ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ svabhāvairyathāvat trisarvajñatāprayogā lakṣyanta iti svabhāvalakṣaṇāni |
SA14n1178:1141: lakṣīva lakṣyate ceti caturthaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ matam ||
SA14n1178:1142: ityevaṃ sāmānyena ekatra kṛtāni ekanavatiḥ lakṣaṇāni bhavanti |
SA14n1178:1144: asya sarvaṃ lakṣaṇādikam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā pratipāditam | tathā hi-
SA14n1178:1148: animittālambanajñānākāreṇa dānādyārabhya sarvākārajñatāparyantaṃ svasantāne samudāgame kauśalalakṣaṇo dharmābhisamaya evātra mokṣabhāgīyamiti lakṣaṇam |
SA14n1178:1160: svarūpataḥ śrutamayaṃ cintāmayaṃ bhāvanāmayamiti trividhaṃ mokṣabhāgīyamiṣṭam |
SA14n1178:1165: saṃsārādīnavān mokṣaguṇāṃśa śrāvaṃ śrāvaṃ romaharṣodgamāśrupātādayo bhavanti,
SA14n1178:1168: asya lakṣaṇādikaṃ sarvam abhisamayālaṅkāre savistaraṃ pratipāditam |
SA14n1178:1180: eṣu caturṣu pratyekaṃ mṛdumadhyādhimātrabhedena trividha iti dvādaśa bhedā bhavati |
SA14n1178:1191: avaivartikabodhisattvasaṃghasya svarūpaṃ ekayā kārikayā abhisamayālaṅkāre proktam | tathā hi-
SA14n1178:1199: paraśca prābandhikabhāvanāmārgastha iti trividho bhavati avaivartikabodhisattvasaṃgha iti trayo'sya bhedā bhavanti |
SA14n1178:1203: asya samatāprayogasya lakṣaṇādim abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā pratipāditam | tathā hi-
SA14n1178:1207: pṛṣṭhalabdhāvasthāyāmapi sattāgrāhakavikalpaparikṣayāt śauddhabhūmikaṃ jñānaṃ bhavaśamasamatāprayogasya lakṣaṇam |
SA14n1178:1209: tisṛṇāṃ śuddhabhūmīnāṃ trīṇi jñānānyevāsya trayo bhedāḥ |
SA14n1178:1213: prayogastāsya lakṣaṇādikaṃ sarvam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā'bhihitam | tathā hi-
SA14n1178:1217: praṇidhānādikuśalamūlabalena svabuddhakṣetraṃ sattvabhājanalokātmakaṃ pariśodhitukāmasya śauddhabhūmikāni jñānānyeva kṣetraśuddhiprayogasya lakṣaṇāni |
SA14n1178:1223: asyopāyakauśalaprayogasya svarūpādikam abhisamayālaṅkāre dvābhyāṃ kārikābhyāmupadarśitam | tathā hi-
SA14n1178:1254: , ityaṣṭau dharmā mūrdhābhisamayamupalakṣayantīti abhisamayālaṅkāre pratipāditam | tathā hi-
SA14n1178:1257: pratyekaṃ darśanākhye ca bhāvanākhye ca vartmani |
SA14n1178:1261: asyoṣmaṇo mūrdhaprayogasya svarūpam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayopadarśitam | tathā hi-
SA14n1178:1265: svapne'pi sarvadharmāṇāṃ svapnābhatvadarśanādiṣu dvādaśaliṅgeṣu anyatamasya prāptyā vyavasthāpitaḥ prathamo nirvedhabhāgīya ūṣmā mūrdhaprayoga iti lakṣaṇam |
SA14n1178:1268: nairātmyālambanāyā vidarśanāyāḥ prāptimārabhya bhūmiprāptiparyantamasya sīmā bhavati |
SA14n1178:1270: asya mūrdhākhyasya mūrdhaprayogasya lakṣaṇādikam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā paridīpitam | tathā hi-
SA14n1178:1274: puṇyavivṛddhyādiṣoḍaśavivṛddhīnāṃ pūrṇatayā māhāyāniko dvitīyo nirvedhabhāgīyo mūrdhā mūrdhaprayoga iti lakṣaṇam |
SA14n1178:1275: ayaṃ mūrdhā mūrdhaprayogaḥ mahāyānaprayogamārgīyo mūrdhaprayogaśceti samānārthakau |
SA14n1178:1281: asya nirūḍhyākhyamūrdhaprayogasya sarvaṃ lakṣaṇādikam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayopavarṇitam | tathā hi-
SA14n1178:1286: anuttarā paripūriḥ nirūḍhyākhyastṛtīyo nirvedhabhāgīyaḥ kṣāntimūrdhaprayoga iti lakṣaṇam |
SA14n1178:1287: ayaṃ kṣāntyākhyo mūrdhaprayogaḥ māhāyānikaḥ prayogamārgīyakṣāntiprayogaśceti dvau samānārthakau |
SA14n1178:1291: yathā māhāyānikāyāḥ prayogamārgīyāyāḥ kṣānteravadhistathā asyāpi prayogasyāvadhirjñātavyaḥ |
SA14n1178:1293: asya agradharmākhyasya mūrdhaprayogasya lakṣaṇādikam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā pratipāditam | tathā hi-
SA14n1178:1305: asya darśanamārgākhyasya mūrdhaprayogasya lakṣaṇādikam abhisamayālaṅkāre savistaraṃ aṣṭādaśabhiḥ kārikābhiḥ pratipāditam |
SA14n1178:1307: darśanaheyāyāḥ sattāgrāhikāyā dṛṣṭeḥ pratipakṣabhāvena vyavasthāpito māhāyānikaḥ satyābhisamayo darśanamārgākhyo mūrdhaprayoga iti lakṣaṇam |
SA14n1178:1308: ayaṃ darśanamārgākhyo mūrdhaprayogaḥ māhāyāniko darśanamārgaśca paryāyau |
SA14n1178:1310: heyadṛṣṭyā darśanaprahātavyānāṃ caturṇāṃ vikalpānāṃ catvāraḥ pratipakṣā iti catvāro'sya prabhedā bhavanti |
SA14n1178:1315: asya bhāvanāmārgākhyasya mūrdhaprayogasya sarvaṃ lakṣaṇādikam abhisamayālaṅkāre navabhiḥ kārikābhiḥ savistaramabhihitam |
SA14n1178:1317: trisarvajñatāparigṛhītayā prakarṣaprāptaprajñayopāttānāṃ bhāvanāprahātavyavikalpapratipakṣāṇāṃ dṛṣṭyā vyavasthāpito māhāyāniko'nvabhisamayaḥ bhāvanāmārgākhyo mūrdhaprayoga iti lakṣaṇam |
SA14n1178:1319: bhāvanāheyānāṃ navānāṃ vikalpānāṃ sākṣāt pratipakṣabhūtā navānantaryamārgāḥ,
SA14n1178:1320: nava ca vimuktimārgā iti aṣṭādaśa asya bhāvanāmārgākhyasya mūrdhaprayogasya bhedā bhavanti |
SA14n1178:1322: prathamāṃ bhūmimārabhya daśamīṃ bhūmiṃ yāvadasya sīmā bhavatīti |
SA14n1178:1326: asya lakṣaṇādikaṃ sarvaṃ svarūpam abhisamayālaṅkāre tisṛbhiḥ kārikābhiḥ samyak pratipāditam | tathā hi-
SA14n1178:1334: trisarvajñatāsaṃgṛhītaprakarṣaprāptaprajñāpāramitābhāvanāyāḥ phalabhūtasya sarvākārajñatāvipākasya avyavahitatvena sākṣādutpādakaḥ paryantayogaḥ ānantaryasamādhyākhyo mūrdhaprayoga iti lakṣaṇam |
SA14n1178:1338: ekakṣaṇikāścatvāraḥ prayoga evāsya catvāro bhedā bhavanti |
SA14n1178:1342: aviditopāyakauśalānāṃ pravādināṃ nānācodyamukhaparamparāprasarpipyo vipratipattiayo'tra nirākarttavyā bhavantīti tāsāṃ vipratipattīnāṃ sarvaṃ lakṣaṇādikaṃ svarūpam abhisamayālaṅkāre tisṛbhiḥ kārikābhiḥ savistaraṃ samyak pratipāditam | tathā hi-
SA14n1178:1345: prayoge triṣu ratneṣu sopāye samaye muneḥ |
SA14n1178:1350: saṃvṛtiparamārthasatyayordvayoḥ svabhāvata ekatvalakṣaṇayoḥ agrahaṇarūpāḥ sammukhībhūtavikalpāḥ tadbījāni vā nirākarttavyā vipratipattaya iti lakṣaṇam |
SA14n1178:1353: tathā hi- saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtadhātvorabhāvatvena ālambanopapattauḥ sarvathā nīrūpatvād ālambanasvabhāvadhāraṇe,
SA14n1178:1366: svasāmānyalakṣaṇānupapattyā bhāvanāyāṃ ceti sarvākārajñatādhiṣṭhānāḥ saṃśayarūpāḥ ṣoḍaśa vipratipattayo bhavanti |
SA14n1178:1367: tāḥ yathāsambhavamubhayasatyāśritopāyakauśalena nirākṛtya samyak sarvathā niścayamutpādya kalyāṇakāmaiḥ bodhisattvairānantaryasamādhiradhigantavyaḥ |
SA14n1178:1370: etāḥ ṣoḍaśāpi vipratipattayo kalpanātmikā śabdātmikā ceti dvayorantarbhavanti |
SA14n1178:1371: dvayoḥ satyayorekamālambya yadaparaṃ nirākaroti tad abhiniveśātmakaṃ jñānameva kalpanātmikā vipratipattiḥ |
SA14n1178:1372: dvayoḥ satyayorekaṃ nimittīkṛtya yā aparaṃ nirākaroti sā vāk śabdātmikā vipratipattiaravaseyā |
SA14n1178:1377: ānupūrvikābhisamayasya svarūpanirdeśaḥ abhisamayālaṅkāre saṃkṣepataḥ kārikāśena kṛtaḥ | tathā hi-
SA14n1178:1379: vistaratastu tasya lakṣaṇādikamanayā ekayā kārikayopanyastam | tathā hi-
SA14n1178:1380: dānena prajñayā yāvad buddhādau smṛtibhiśca sā |
SA14n1178:1383: sarvākārajñatāditrisarvajñatākārān adhigatān anupūrvīkṛtya prajñābhāvanayopāttaḥ sattvayogaḥ ānupūrvikaprayoga iti lakṣaṇam |
SA14n1178:1386: , buddha - dharma-saṃgha- śīla- tyāga- devatā- nāmanusmaraṇena (ṣaṭ)
SA14n1178:1388: yo'dhigamaḥ sa ānupūrvikābhisamayastrayodaśavidha ityasya trayodaśa bhedā bhavanti |
SA14n1178:1393: ekakṣaṇābhisambodhasya svarūpanirdeśaḥ abhisamayālaṅkāre kārikārdhena saṃkṣepataḥ kṛtaḥ | tathā hi-
SA14n1178:1397: adhigatatrisarvajñatākāreṣu svabhyastasteṣāmeva kṣaṇenaikenādhigamarūpaḥ paryantayogaḥ ekakṣaṇābhisambodha iti lakṣaṇam |
SA14n1178:1408: asya sarvaṃ svarūpam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā parīdīpitam | tathā hi-
SA14n1178:1412: ekakṣaṇadānādijñānena anāsravadānādyaśītyanuvyañjanalakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ saṃgraheṇa bodhisattvasya avabodharūpaḥ paryantayogaḥ avipākānāsravasarvadharmaikakṣaṇalakṣaṇo bhavatīti lakṣaṇam |
SA14n1178:1414: asya sarvaṃ svarūpam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā samyagabhihitam | tathā hi-
SA14n1178:1418: yadā bodhisattvasya pratipakṣabhāvanayā sarvavipakṣakalaṅkāpagamena sakalavyavadānapakṣavipākadharmatāvasthā śuklasvabhāvā jātā,
SA14n1178:1419: tadā ekasminneva kṣaṇe vipākāvasthāprāptānām anāsravadharmāṇāṃ bodhāt jñānaṃ (prajñāpāramitā)
SA14n1178:1424: asya svarūpādikaṃ sarvam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā suspaṣṭamupavarṇitam | tathā hi -
SA14n1178:1428: pūrvaṃ svapnopamasarvadharmābhyāsena sambhāradvayamanubhūya adhigamāvasthāyāṃ svapnasvabhāveṣu sarvadharmeṣu upādānaskandhādiṣu sthitvā dānādiṣaṭpāramitāpratipattyā dānādirūpanirūpaṇākāreṇa alakṣaṇāḥ sarvadharmā iti saṃkleśavyavadānarūpāṇāṃ sarvadharmāṇāmekenaiva kṣaṇena alakṣaṇatvaṃ jānāti,
SA14n1178:1431: asyādvayalakṣaṇasya svarūpam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā spaṣṭamupadarśitam | tathā hi-
SA14n1178:1435: nirantaradīrghakāladvayapratibhāsaprahāṇābhyāsasātmībhāvād unmīlitadvayapratibhāsavāsano yadā bodhisattvo grāhyagrāhakayogena svapnaṃ grāhyaṃ svapnadarśinaṃ grāhakaṃ nekṣate,
SA14n1178:1436: tadā sarve'pyevaṃdharmāṇo dharmā iti dharmāṇāmadvayaṃ tattvamekenaiva kṣaṇena paśyati,
SA14n1178:1443: aya ityadhigama ityevaṃ antimakāle dānādisarvānāsravadharmāṇāmaviparītaḥ samyak prativedhaḥ ekakṣaṇābhisambodha ityucyate |
SA14n1178:1448: vipākabhūtasya dharmakāyasya saṃkṣiptanirdeśaḥ abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā paridīpitaḥ | tathā hi-
SA14n1178:1454: sambhāradvayasaṃcayabalena prāptāḥ paryantaguṇā eva phalabhūto dharmakāya iti lakṣaṇam |
SA14n1178:1462: asya svābhāvikakāyasyopapādanam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā kṛtam | tathā hi-
SA14n1178:1463: sarvākārāṃ viśuddhiṃ ye dharmāḥ prāptā nirāsravāḥ |
SA14n1178:1472: asya jñānakāyasya svarūpam abhisamayālaṅkāre pañcabhiḥ kārikābhirupadarśitam |
SA14n1178:1474: yāvajjñānaṃ yathāvajjñānaṃ cāpekṣya sākṣātkāri paryantajñāna jñānadharmakāya iti lakṣaṇam |
SA14n1178:1477: buddhabhūmau anāsravajñānānāmekaviṃśatiḥ jñānavargā evāsya ekaviṃśatiḥ prabhedāḥ | tathā hi-
SA14n1178:1513: sambhogakāyasya svarūpavarṇanam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā kṛtam | tathā hi -
SA14n1178:1517: sthāna- kāya- parivāra- dharma- kālākhyaiḥ pañcabhirviniyatairvirśiṣṭaḥ kāyaḥ sambhogakāya iti lakṣaṇam |
SA14n1178:1523: ayaṃ sambhogakāyo buddhabhūmau akaniṣṭhaghanavyūhakṣetre eva kevalaṃ bhavati |
SA14n1178:1525: kāyasyāsya nairmāṇikasya svarūpam abhisamayālaṅkāre kārikayā ekayā samyagupavarṇitam | tathā hi-
SA14n1178:1526: karoti yena citrāṇi hitāni jagataḥ samam |
SA14n1178:1527: ā bhavāt so'nupacchinnaḥ kāyo nairmāṇiko muneḥ ||
SA14n1178:1530: yena śākyamunitathāgatādirūpeṇa āsaṃsāraṃ sarvalokadhātuṣu sattvānāṃ samīhitamarthaṃ samaṃ karoti,
SA14n1178:1531: asau kāyaḥ prabandhatayā anuparato nairmāṇiko buddhasya bhagavataḥ sarvabālajanasādhāraṇaścaturtho'vasātavyaḥ |
SA14n1178:1538: imāni bhagavato vicitrāṇi kāritrāṇi abhisamayālaṅkāre saptabhiḥ kārikābhirvistaraśo nirdiṣṭāni |
SA14n1178:1542: gatipraśamanakāritrata ārabhya nirvāṇaniveśanaparyantaṃ saptaviṃśatiḥ karmāṇyevāsya saptaviṃśatiḥ prabhedā bhavanti |
SA14n1178:1545: gatīnāṃ śamanaṃ karmaṃ saṃġrahe ca caturvidhe ||
SA14n1178:1566: vineyajanapratibhāsabhāk saptaviṃśatiprakāraṃ karma avicchinnatayā āsaṃsāraṃ pravartate |
SA14n1178:1570: aṣṭapadārthopalakṣakāṇāṃ ca saptateḥ padārthānāṃ prakāśakamidaṃ subhāṣitaṃ jagadguroḥ maitreyanāthasya mukhānniḥ - sṛtasyāgamasya caturdikṣuḥ prasārāya lokasya ca sanmārgārohaṇāya prabhavediti pariṇāmanā |
